ActFederal Accountability Act
SubjectBill C-2 - CiF Federal Accountability Act (Extend coverage of ATI and Privacy Act to other government institutions
PrecisOrder fixing APRIL 1, 2007 as the day on which certain provisions of the FEDERAL ACCOUNTABILITY ACT (S.C.2006, c.9), which extend the application of the Access to Information Act and the Privacy Act to a number of government institutions and create exemptions respecting investigative information, COME INTO FORCE.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2007-0020 Publication Date: 2007-03-07
AttachmentsAttachment
